about_the_game:
This is NOT “Exit  8 Like”!

At last, the first story-driven horror game in the Bansen Series has arrived!

The mysteries surrounding the popular character “Ojisan,” strange objects, and unsettling phenomena are about to be revealed…!

Set in the intricate Senjuku Station—nicknamed the “Senjuku Dungeon”—an anomaly occurs, prompting an evacuation order. Yet one person, Ojisan, is left behind. As part of the rescue team, your mission is to save him…

Important Notes

  • Please help keep the station clean at all times. If you see trash, pick it up immediately—it may serve as a weapon in a pinch. Your cooperation is appreciated.

  • If you encounter anything suspicious within the station, run away immediately.

  • Search for Ojisan.

  • Earn Ojisan’s trust.

Video Posting Guidelines

We wholeheartedly welcome any form of video uploads, such as gameplay or live streams! We hope many people will discover and enjoy our game. Therefore, you are free to stream and create content featuring any MFC STUDIO title. Thank you for your support!

At last, the first story-driven horror game in the Bansen Series has arrived!

The mysteries surrounding the popular character “Ojisan,” strange objects, and unsettling phenomena are about to be revealed…!

Set in the intricate Senjuku Station—nicknamed the “Senjuku Dungeon”—an anomaly occurs, prompting an evacuation order. Yet one person, Ojisan, is left behind. As part of the rescue team, your mission is to save him…

Important Notes

  • Please help keep the station clean at all times. If you see trash, pick it up immediately—it may serve as a weapon in a pinch. Your cooperation is appreciated.

  • If you encounter anything suspicious within the station, run away immediately.

  • Search for Ojisan.

  • Earn Ojisan’s trust.

Video Posting Guidelines

We wholeheartedly welcome any form of video uploads, such as gameplay or live streams! We hope many people will discover and enjoy our game. Therefore, you are free to stream and create content featuring any MFC STUDIO title. Thank you for your support!
name: 5番線おじさん救出編 Platform 5 STORYS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690 @ 3.5 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X @ 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 460 with 2 GB VRAM or more
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The latest horror entry in the “Bansen Series,” now without anomaly hunting! A sudden evacuation at Senjuku Station, the world’s most complex, leaves Ojisan behind. Flee anomalies, conquer the “Senjuku Dungeon,” and uncover the truth behind Platforms 2, 3, and 4…
